summary: Under the Athenian night sky, before the silent threat of an imminent socio-economic crisis, a young man goes for a stroll and meets the love of his life. Does fate govern one's existence? What would have happened if he stayed in, instead?
cast: Christopher Papakaliatis|Marina Kalogirou|Giorgos Konstadinou|Maro Kodou|Maria Solomou|Fanis Mouratidis|Akilas Karazisis|Takis Spyridakis|Tasos Iordanidis|Themis Bazaka|Vassilis Haralambopoulos|Jackie|Ioli Angelopoulou|Dimitra Bithara|Anthi Evelina|Manos Fotakis|Angelos Gikas|Vera Hatziakovou|Spyros Katharios|Dimitris Kontogiorgis|Christos Mavridis|Hronis Missios|Dimitris Papadopoulos|Giorgos Psichogios|Foivi Zaharaki-Koulouboura|Dimitris Kastanias|Elias J. Kay|Iro Mitroutsikou
keywords: greece|parallel narrative|parallel story|greek crisis|twist of fate
